website_summaries.verdict: A modern bar cart you can use for a variety of purposes or activities.
pros: Unique combination of  modern and rustic stylistic elements
Large shelves can handle extra weight

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: one of the shelves is peeling/damaged and it was on the bottom of the box so wasn’t noticed until the furniture was 50% assembled. We had to tape the part that was peeling and put that shelf on the bottom in order for it to be usable.
customer_reviews.author: Emunah

customer_reviews.title: Love this storage cart !
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sturdy utility organizer. It came quickly and in good condition. Easy to follow where everything needs to be put up. It is sturdy and also in good quality. Not limited to kitchen serving cart & laundry supplies. I will put it in my industrial themed room. This not only gave me plenty of counter space, but it gave a storage solution as well. It has deep enough basket so my thread isn't falling out and the wheels run so smoothly. Thanks for this very nice and functional cart !
customer_reviews.author: Roderick

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together...
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fit for the end of my sectional couch. I use the bottom shelf for a throw blanket, the middle shelf for pictures and decorative candles, and the top for a reading lamp and to put my coffee cup or cocktail glass on. It's the perfect height-width-length. And it was so easy to put together. I have 2 more of these rolling carts, from Amazon, ( the 2 tier ones ) and these things are really good quality and look very stylish. Super happy with all of them. Friends love how I have used these carts in unique ways.
customer_reviews.author: jodie basso

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and even better customer service from this seller. The product itself is sleek, modern and looks great no matter what you utilize it for. But even more impressive was the service I received from this seller. There was an issue with my original order, and maybe to no fault of their own but rather shipping, and they went above and beyond to rectify the situation. Couldn't be more pleased all around. Will be back for more. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with lots of storage!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great investment! We had 30+ alcoholic beverages on the counter of our kitchen, and had no space for anything, so buying this saved us so much space!!!!! It is very sturdy and fancy looking! So thats a plus! I am a girl and I assembled this myself .... sooo it’s pretty easy! The instructions were clear, and it took me about an hour and little more to build it! Get it! You can use it for anything you want!
customer_reviews.author: Milan Kovacevic

customer_reviews.title: I am pleasantly surprised how fun and easy to put this cart together in about ...
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised how fun and easy to put this cart together in about 2 hours. I don't consider myself handy but I love playing lego. It felt like I was just putting a big lego set together. All the holes for assembling are precise and clean. The pictorial instruction is super clear. All the screws and parts are well organized. Its quality is great and fit perfectly in my studio space. I don't have any complaint.
customer_reviews.author: BerrySweet

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been stalking this rolling cart for months...wondering if it is worth the money. I finally made the purchase, and let me just tell you...it was definitely worth the $90. Very easy to assemble, and looks very nice once complete. This is now my favorite piece of furniture that I own. 10/10 do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bar Cart
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to fit in the little nook of my kitchen. Great size and look. I had to hire someone to put it together because I don't have the patience. I did see him use a drill. Took him about 45 min to an hour to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: S.I.

customer_reviews.title: Decent but slight issues
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived extremely damaged to the point that it was almost falling apart. Luckily nothing inside was damaged. However, when I was in the process of assembling the cart I noticed there was a piece of wood that was supposed to have some holes drilled in it where some screws are meant to go but there were no holes. I was able to fix the problem with some strong wood glue because I couldn’t use the necessary screw. It’s a decent little cart and seems sturdy enough. Even with the sligh trouble I had with it I’m still glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a bar cart! It was pretty sturdy. The assemble part is not as hard I thought. Unfortunately, I’ve found almost the same in the store which cost less. I would say this one is a ‘lil bit overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Sica

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: This cart looks great and holds a lot! It was a little cumbersome for one person to assemble, but doable. Very happy with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Sharha

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my work-from-home setup. I can stack my papers, my pens, drinks and whatever I use throughout the work day, then easily roll it away when I need to use the space for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie A

customer_reviews.title: One of the wheels broke right away
customer_reviews.text: This broke down the next day I assemble it. One of the wheels broke down and I tried to glue back but no luck. I had to have it leaning on a piece of wood
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit taller than expected, but still fits where I need it.
customer_reviews.text: love the color and sturdiness. It was easy and quick to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cart for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This cart turned out great! I was worried about the wood looking cheap but it was super easy to put together and it looks really nice. I was really impressed with how sturdy it turned out to be and it’s perfect for storing extra office supplies without looking messy.
customer_reviews.author: Danika Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but unnecessarily ships in a million pieces making assembly way too long. Instructions were vague causing re-work.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Wheels on cart broke right away.
customer_reviews.text: Two wheels on this cart broke right away. I've been trying to repair it to no avail. Not sure I have any recourse through Amazon because it came from a third party. Not sure I would order anything like this again through ecommerce.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A.

customer_reviews.title: Wheels cheap and break and NOT as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Cart nice overall...except the wheels. They are cheap plastic wheels that break extremely easily. We have maybe 10-15 pounds on the cart and no rough flooring and after a few months use 2 of our wheels completely broke in half. Customer service has been poor and hasn't gotten back to us. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Wheels come off
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice cart - except where the wheels attach to the cart. It is a small metal square that the wheels screw into...the little square becomes unwelded very easily. Quick bonding glue doesn't work well and I don't weld so returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor pre-assembly drilling preparation.
customer_reviews.text: This product was poorly drilled. All of the shelves were drilled for the underside was on top. Instead of a 3.5" lip on top, there is only a 1/2". None of the shelves spanned the full length. From the pictures provided, you can see the flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's really beautiful and so easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It's really beautiful and so easy to put together. I live abroad so ended up paying more for shipping than for the cart itself
customer_reviews.author: Alejo

customer_reviews.title: Defect, but AWESOME customer service
customer_reviews.text: The cart itself if very nice, however, the piece labled "H" was defected and did not have holes. However the seller immediately sent the piece and I now love the cart.
customer_reviews.author: Mo.Re

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Shelving material not quite what I expected but works
customer_reviews.author: Ziga

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Loved this. Owned it 7 months and moved it to clean behind it and a wheel fell off. Not in a fashion that it could be put back either, the welding failed.
customer_reviews.author: EmClare

customer_reviews.title: Can We Get Parts?
customer_reviews.text: This cart is very nice and sturdy. A problem we encountered was completely and quickly solved by the seller. We are could not be more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will realize you always needed this but didn’t know it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent functionality and look. Great for everyday use and entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Denise R Basey

customer_reviews.title: Great cart at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this rolling cart! The quality is great and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. There’s supposed to 4 holes on a board ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. There’s supposed to 4 holes on a board but there were only 2. So I can’t not assemble the entire cart because the nail couldn’t go in to the board. N I can’t return it because I throw the package box away so I had to throw the entire thing away because it’s simply useless.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Handy cart!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this rolling cart. I will use it in my bedroom for now.
customer_reviews.author: Dian griffin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rolling cart
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rolling cart ! Easy to assemble but just time consuming took about 45 Min. Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Movable Dry Bar Best Ever Idea
customer_reviews.text: Fun to assemble; don't rush, listen to music, take a break, have some coffee or cuppa tea; avoid alcohol if you want it constructed correctly; using an electric screwdriver helps End result good for displaying and enjoying your favorite beverages every thing within easy reach Add ice bucket and you are good Now the alcohol is suited to the job of relaxing Looks good with central CA coast driftwood matching effect
customer_reviews.author: JCM,  Los Angeles, CA

product_meta.title: roomfitters 3 Tier Rolling Utility Storage Cart, Kitchen Serving Bar Cart, Multipurpose Bathroom Nursery, Oak
feature_bullets: Multi-functional: This Bar Serving Cart on wheels is ideal for use in any rooms. Keeps necessary supplies at any desired area for easy access.
Material: P2 MDF with powder coated metal.
2 Locking and 2 unlocking casters for easy transportation.
Easy to put together. Required assembly tools included.
Dimensions: 21.2"L x 13.3"D x 35.8"H. Design to accommodate smaller spaces,save your space, save your budget.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars63 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
